name: The Lost Tapes
description:
Ramli, Sudin, and Aziz went to an abandoned building. They wanted the adrenaline rush of doing ghost-hunting activities. The story takes place in an abandoned building located in their hometown. As they entered the building, they got disturbed by an entity. Sudin and Aziz run cowardly until they lose each other. Ramli who was busy rummaging through a desk later found his two friends has gone missing. Ramli felt the need as a friend to save the others that have gone missing.

Ramli begins his search for Sudin and Aziz with a flashlight in his hand. With only a flashlight, Ramli starts the search for his missing friends. Adding more problems to the story, Ramli has to find a scavenge battery scattered in the old building to keep his flashlight alive. Ramli begins to debunk the mysterious building story as he continues the search. . .
